solution_line_template: When Jennifer is {jennifer_age_in_future} years old in ten years, her sister Jordana will be {jordana_age_multiplier}*{jennifer_age_in_future}=<<{jordana_age_multiplier}*{jennifer_age_in_future}={jordana_age_in_future}>>{jordana_age_in_future} years old.
She's currently {years_from_now} years younger, so she's {jordana_age_in_future} - {years_from_now} = <<{jordana_age_in_future}-{years_from_now}={jordana_current_age}>>{jordana_current_age} years old
